articles.title: Google admits it failed to warn 10 million of Turkey earthquake - BBC
articles.description: The tech giant said only 469 serious warnings were sent out ahead of the 7.8 magnitude quake.
articles.content:
James Clayton, Anna Foster and Ben Derico
Google has admitted its earthquake early warning system failed to accurately alert people during Turkey's deadly quake of 2023.
Ten million people within 9… [+4317 chars]
